name: SnakeLike (indutny)
description:
SnakeLike is a modern interpretation of classic retro game "Snake". Unlike its counterpart, SnakeLike's player can:

  • Mine different resources with increasing speed for a longer snake
  • Strategically sell part or all of these resources
  • Buy upgrades using previously sold resources
  • Repeat!

The controls are PICO-8 standard: arrow keys for movement, "X" for selection, "Z" for going back.
